name: Sushi
description: Sushi (Version 1.7) is a programming language that lets you edit and create background.js files via a alias on your hard drive. To find out more about Sushi, visit http://maxcorptech.com/sushi or continue reading this description. Supported types of JS: Chrome extension JS, (declarativeContent and unlimitedStorage) color-js (color: '#3aa757') and other JS you know.
